title: SAW Sequel Updates! Will The Film Be Delayed Again?!
author: Reel Talk
comment: I hope it’s not delayed. I remember the day it was supposed to come out, I was so hyped and excited. That same day, I found out it was delayed till 2021 and I was so disappointed.
Instead of letting it stand on its own merits and releasing it to the public they keep pushing these back people aren’t going to care.
If its delayed again, it'll be more vulnerable to spoilers being revealed, even if the actual story is relatively spoiler-free, more say than No Time To Die or Halloween Kills
For me, the story was always the main and almost everything I was interested in the Saw franchise.
Stick with the May release but also release it on every VOD platform for 20-30$
description:
SAW Sequel Updates! Will The Film Be Delayed Again?!

According to the director, the film will be less gory than other sequels in the franchise, and it is a character piece that puts the main story on the backburner. At the same time, we have to ask ourselves if the film will be delayed like some of the more high profile films in the summer season.
